attributes.action: Write into law a constitution: a document by which the country will be governed.
attributes.background:
A written constitution will ensure the basic laws of the nation are codified, and are easily accessible and understood by all.

It will protect the liberty, equality, and democratic right of every citizen.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand you'd like a written constitution, but we're not sure what you'd like it to contain. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
